analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/21/0x5db4b520284049d7dcb21c6317664190791bb8e5.sol:
	Contract Tangent has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/21/0x5db4b520284049d7dcb21c6317664190791bb8e5.sol#132-133)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

TangentStake.cashOut (/unique_chucks/21/0x5db4b520284049d7dcb21c6317664190791bb8e5.sol#226-247) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenContract.transfer(msg.sender,tangles) (/unique_chucks/21/0x5db4b520284049d7dcb21c6317664190791bb8e5.sol#245)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/21/0x5db4b520284049d7dcb21c6317664190791bb8e5.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.20 (/unique_chucks/21/0x5db4b520284049d7dcb21c6317664190791bb8e5.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/21/0x5db4b520284049d7dcb21c6317664190791bb8e5.sol#57-58) is not in mixedCase
